doc:
Clare Kramer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clare_Kramer 0 Clare Elizabeth Kramer (born September 3, 1974) is an American actress best known for her starring role of Glory on Buffy the Vampire Slayer and for her role as Courtney in Bring It On. She is a co-founder of GeekNation and hosts the podcast Take Five with Clare Kramer. Clare_Elizabeth_Kramer ( born September_3_,_1974 ) is an_American_actress best_known for her_starring_role of Glory on Buffy the_Vampire_Slayer and for her_role as Courtney in Bring It On . She is a_co-founder of GeekNation and hosts the_podcast Take Five with Clare_Kramer .
